sense.def:
Appreciation of something
je priznanje in užitek ob dobri kakovosti nečesa.

seg.quote: He had little appreciation of great plays.

sense.def:
To show one's appreciation for something
pomeni pokazati, da smo hvaležni za tisto, kar je nekdo storil za nas.

An appreciation of someone
na primer umetnika, je razprava in ocenjevanje njegovih dosežkov.
